comments.text: The NSS built-in root module is normally packaged with NSS but it is versioned separately. Sometimes we change only the contents of this root module to fix security bugs; for example, we did this for the Comodogate issue and for the DigiNotar issue. In configure.in, We should be able to state which version of the built-in root module is necessary for secure operation of Firefox.
